posts.post_title: T205 John McGraw. Hi end SGC 40
posts.post_content:
For sale is the Beutiful T205 John McGraw. Graded SGC 40. pretty card w clean Piedmont back. IMO, hi end 40. u will love this card. 

Little Napolean is sold. Thanks. Scott
